name: UNCLEANON'S SUPERB EXPERIENCES: IRAQ
description:
Experience The Thrill Of A Lifetime As You Play As A Homeless Uncle Getting Shipped To Iraq. 

Uh oh! Looks like you screwed up big time! 70k in debt and homeless, how are you going to wiggle your way out of this pickle? Luckily you landed yourself a job in the U.S. Military where you can slowly work to pay off your debts... That is if you don't get shipped to Iraq which unfortunately happens. Oh well, not my problem

Features:

- 6 Unique Endings Based On Your Choices Throughout the game

-Anime

-Custom Name

-Iraq

-Women

Let me know in the comments which ending you got!

If you want to make a translation so your family can enjoy the game too give me a call
